Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Ate he meri kauma! Ajiha na hove ki mere virudha tuhadi hatha dharami tuhanu kise bipata vica lai jave. Jihari nuha, huda jam saleha di kauma upara a'i si ate luta di kauma tam tuhade tom dura vi nahim
Apane raba tom mu'afi magom ate usa vala mura ja'u. Besaka mera raba rahimata ate muhabata vala hai

Unham ne kiha he su'aiba! Jo tusim karade ho usa da bahuta hisa sadi samajha vica nahim a'unda ate asim tam dekhade ham ki tu sade tom ghata haim ate jekara tu sadi baradari da na huda tam asim' tainu sagasara (patharam nala mara sutana) kara dide. Ate tuhanu sade upara ko'i sresatata nahim
Su'aiba ne kiha ki he meri kauma! Ki meri baradari tuhade la'i alaha tom zi'ada sakatisali hai. Ate alaha nu tusim piche chada dita. Besaka jo kujha tusim karade ho. Uha mere raba de vasa vica hai

Ate he meri kauma! Tusim apane rivaza de anusara kama karade ja'u ate saim apani mari'ada mutabika kama karada rahanga. Jaladi hi tuhanu pata laga javega ki kisa upara be'izata karana vali afata a'undi hai ate kauna jhutha hai ate udika karo maim vi tuhade nala udika karana vali'am vica ham

Ate jadom sada adesa a'i'a tam asim su'aiba ate jihare usa nala imana li'a'e sana (unham nu) apani rahimata nala baca li'a ate jinham lokam ne julama kita si unham nu sijali di karaka ne pharha li'a. Tam uha apane gharam vica mudhe muha pa'e rahi ga'e
Mano, uha unham vica kade vase hi nahim si. Suno, `lahanata hai madayana nu jivem lahanata ho'i si sasuva nu
Ate asim musa nu apani'am nisani'am ate khul'hi'am dalilam nala bheji'a
Phira'auna ate usa de saradaram vala ate uha phira'auna de hukamam upara zale halanki phira'auna da hukama ucita nahim si
